title: Trump Reinstating Tariffs on Aluminum, Black Friday & Cyber Monday Data, Conflicting Trends in the Global Economy
itunes:title: Trump Reinstating Tariffs on Aluminum, Black Friday & Cyber Monday Data, Conflicting Trends in the Global Economy
description:
Bloomberg News Metals & Mining Reporter Joe Deaux discusses President Trump reinstating tariffs on aluminum from Argentina and Brazil. Harley Finkelstein, Chief Operating Officer at Shopify, talks about Black Friday/Cyber Monday sales data. Andy Browne, Bloomberg New Economy Editorial Director, explains how conflicting trends could create a new divide in the global economy. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Hedge Fund Reporter Nishant Kumar share insight on the billionaire hedge fund manager with quantum ambitions. And we Drive to the Close with Shawn Cruz, Manager of Trader Strategy at TD Ameritrade.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.


See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
